attributes.action: Free Michael Shields NOW - for Xmas 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aim is to get Michael Shields out of prison for THIS XMAS (XMAS 2008) i.e. on licence while his case is reviewed.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
